tool_description: Convert domains into full company profiles.
name: Company
title: Company

api_list.name: Company API Streaming
api_list.description: An alternative to using our async lookup or webhooks is our streaming API. This API is ideal if you don’t mind long lived requests (e.g. you’re making requests to BigPicture from a messaging queue).

api_list.name: Company API
api_list.description: The Company API enables you to lookup company data based on a domain name. This can be used to retrieve the company's information such as name, address, industry, headcount, and various other details from their domain name.
